name: Predator Panic
description:
[Submission for the 2021 Yogscast JingleJam GameJam]

It's the animal 1920s and your presinct has gotten a tip for a large fox mafia crime ring.
Can you prevent the fox mafia from taking over?

Controls:
Use your mouse for everything.
Click one one of your bases to select it, click on another base to send troops to that zone.

Credits:
Code, Art, Sound: Wesley and Steef
